thread.title: Watch White House briefing on budget and infrastructure plans

author: Jacob Pramuk
title: Watch White House briefing on budget and infrastructure plans
text:
[ The stream is slated to start at 3:30 pm, ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time. ]
The White House briefs reporters Monday after the Trump administration released both its infrastructure proposal and its proposed fiscal year 2019 budget. 
Read more: 
The Trump administration's $200 billion infrastructure plan unveiled Monday includes a mix of grants and loans 
Trump budget calls for 2% reductions in discretionary spending after 2019
